mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Charles S. Dobyns
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Charles S. Dobyns F. O. Dobyns, Guardian B. P. Elliott, Clerk of Floyd County Court, Guardian ad Litem for Charles S. Dobyns W. H. Morgan, Commissioner of Accounts in the matter F. O. Dobyns vs. Charles S. Dobyns Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 61, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
